project.name: Plannotator
project.tagline: Interactive Plan & Code Review for AI Agents
project.description: Visual review tool for Claude Code and OpenCode. Mark up AI-generated plans with precise annotations, review Git diffs with line-level comments, share via URL, and auto-save to Obsidian/Bear.

features.title: Why Plannotator?
features.subtitle: Stop reading plans in the terminal. Review visually, annotate precisely, collaborate seamlessly.

list.title: Visual Plan Review
list.desc: View AI-generated plans in your browser. Add delete, replace, insert, and comment annotations with a single click.

list.title: Code Review with Git Diff
list.desc: Review code changes with side-by-side or unified diff views. Add line-level comments, suggestions, and concerns.

list.title: Image Annotation Tools
list.desc: Attach images and annotate with brush, arrow, and circle tools. Perfect for UI feedback and visual explanations.

list.title: URL Sharing Without Backend
list.desc: Share review content via URL hash using Deflate compression. No server requiredâ€”fully client-side.

list.title: Obsidian & Bear Integration
list.desc: Auto-save approved plans to your note-taking app with frontmatter and tags. Build your knowledge base automatically.

list.title: Claude Code & OpenCode Support
list.desc: Seamless integration with both platforms. Install via plugin system or manual hook configuration.
